radiographic_examinations.findings: Generalized lymph-node enlargement, up to 2.8 cm in diameter, and mild splenomegaly. Diffuse lymphadenopathy in the neck, thorax, abdomen, and pelvis.
Extensive FDG-avid lymphadenopathy in the cervical, axillary, mediastinal, hilar, retroperitoneal, and inguinal chains bilaterally. The spleen was markedly enlarged and FDG-avid.
